message: coroutine exception __context__ leak python python every exception auto attached __context__ exception raised existing exception handled often useful property allows user see underlying cause many problem however dealing async code via coroutines feature suddenly become pretty big issue namely generator.throw back coroutine raise exception correct scope coroutine raise exception later time nested exception logically nested patch resolve issue coroutine code moving gen.throw outside exception handler user code scope able later raise exception without worrying inheriting prior exception context
